citations.narrative:
One hammock in the coatimundi enclosure is frayed with hanging strings present. In addition, the armadillo enclosure
has a blue tarp around the lower edge of the enclosure that is torn in several areas. The damaged materials may pose a
safety risk and be ingested by the animals.
The hammock was corrected at the time of inspection. Correct the armadillo enclosure by: February 3, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
End Section

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
One hammock in the coatimundi enclosure is frayed with hanging strings present.  In addition, the armadillo enclosure 
has a blue tarp around the lower edge of the enclosure that is torn in several areas.  The damaged materials may pose a 
safety risk and be ingested by the animals.   
 
The hammock was corrected at the time of inspection.  Correct the armadillo enclosure by:  February 3, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. 
 
End Section
